lead_paragraph: Stocks appeared headed for new highs in the morning, but drifted lower in the afternoon as health care companies dropped sharply.

headline.print_headline: Shares Decline in Afternoon After Promising Morning and Week of Gains
headline.main: Wall St. Loses Ground Ahead of Earnings Reports

snippet: Stocks appeared headed for new highs in the morning, but drifted lower in the afternoon as health care companies dropped sharply.
abstract: Stock market slumps as investors react to earnings reports from number of companies, particularly in health care sector.
